entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: The main character of the story, who received a bottle of Felix Felicis from Professor McGonagall.

entities.name: felix felicis
entities.description: A magical liquid that brings good luck to its user.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Harry's friend and classmate, who is disappointed by Harry's actions.

entities.name: ron weasley
entities.description: Harry's friend and classmate, who is dumbfounded by Harry's actions.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: A Slytherin student who is within earshot of Harry's conversation with Ron.

entities.name: slytherins
entities.description: The group of students from Slytherin house, who are furious at Harry's actions.

relationships.description: Harry received the bottle of Felix Felicis from Professor McGonagall.
Harry and Hermione have a conversation about Harry's actions.
Harry and Ron have a conversation about Harry's actions.
Hermione is disapproving of Harry's actions.
